comment.body:
Спасибо. Добавлю privacy-минимум:

app.shield.optoutstudies.enabled -> false
extensions.shield-recipe-client.enabled -> false
(https://firefox-source-docs.mozilla.org/browser/extensions/shield-recipe-client/shield-recipe-client/index.html)

security.OCSP.enabled -> 0
(https://www.zdnet.com/article/chrome-does-certificate-revocation-better/)
